patthana23.47:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.47:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.47:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.47:6.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
